title: Overnight Bangladesh ferry inferno kills dozens, injures scores more. Many passengers jumped off, swam ashore.
content:
1. Overnight Bangladesh ferry inferno kills dozens, injures scores more. Many passengers jumped off, swam ashore.  CBS News
  2. Bangladesh: dozens dead after fire sweeps through ferry  Guardian News
  3. Massive Bangladesh ferry fire kills at least 39  Fox News
  4. Dozens dead in Bangladesh ferry fire  Al Jazeera English
  5. Bangladesh ferry fire: Dozens killed near Jhalakathi  BBC News
contentSnippet:
Overnight Bangladesh ferry inferno kills dozens, injures scores more. Many passengers jumped off, swam ashore.  CBS News
Bangladesh: dozens dead after fire sweeps through ferry  Guardian News
Massive Bangladesh ferry fire kills at least 39  Fox News
Dozens dead in Bangladesh ferry fire  Al Jazeera English
Bangladesh ferry fire: Dozens killed near Jhalakathi  BBC News

localize.title: バングラデシュのフェリーで夜間火災が発生し、数十人が死亡、数十人が負傷した。多くの乗客が飛び降り、泳いで岸にたどり着いた。
一夜之间，孟加拉国渡轮发生火灾，造成数十人死亡，数十人受伤。许多乘客跳下船，游上岸。
一夜之間，孟加拉國渡輪發生火災，造成數十人死亡，數十人受傷。許多乘客跳下船，游上岸。
